quote_last: . Who wants to help me hand out glasses and pour champagne?”
title: Warrior Monk
author: Ray Keating

quote_first: I went to the kitchen to select another bottle, deciding to reduce the next day’s alcohol intake to compensate. Then I saw the clock:
quote_last: . I picked up the phone and ordered a taxi. With any luck it would arrive before the after-midnight tariff commenced.
title: The Rosie Project
author: Graeme Simsion

quote_last: , before Oliver put an end to the festivities, she gave in to her impulse and texted her son, reminding him of their mutually agreed-upon curfew.
title: Behind the Lie
author: Emilya Naymark

quote_first: We all have the maps and appliances of various kinds that can be had. Professor Van Helsing and I are to leave by the
quote_last: train tonight for Veresti, where we are to get a carriage to drive to the Borgo Pass. We are bringing a good deal of ready money, as we are to buy a carriage and horses.
title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
